attributes.additional_details:
For too long the minority of wealthy elite have unfairly ruled and made decisions on behalf of the majority. This goes against the principles of living within a democracy, meaning “rule of the people” with the majority being “the people”.

Under a new Socialist state decisions will be made by the majority for the majority and these actions will be implemented.

Abolition of Monarchy and Political Parties, council members to independently represent their constituency if voted into government.

Constituencies  given more autonomy.

Those over 18  free to stand as council member regardless of background or experience.

Independence for rest of UK.

Abolition of Trade Unions.

Stricter regulation of Capitalism.

Prioritizing of the unemployed.

The right to a full free education.

Nationalisation of banks and insurance firms.

The aims of a Socialist state is to give power back to the majority who at present suffer due to the elite minority.
